name: New Adversary
description: This my first Adversary. Please, be pleasant with them.

abilities.name: Adversary with bow
abilities.description: Adversary with bow can attack with either bow or blade.

abilities.name: Adversary with shield
abilities.description: Adversary with shield has a Vigour of 4 rather than 3.

abilities.name: Adversary with axe and blade
abilities.description: Adversary with axe and blade can attack with both blade and axe at the same time.

abilities.name: Warchief
abilities.description: Adversary Warchief doubles the amount of dices for their Attack Roll.

difficultyBonuses.description: Instead of +1 to Vigour, adversaries gain +1 to their Move & Agility characteristics.

table.name: Move & Attack
table.description: Each adversary moves towards the nearest Hero, and attacks them with whichever weapon is in range.

table.name: Attack & Move
table.description: Each adversary attacks Heroes with whichever weapon is in range. Then, each adversary can move in any direction.

table.name: Panic
table.description: Each adversary moves as far away as possible from Heroes.
